name: 2025 9th International Conference on Civil Engineering
content: Paper Publishing Submissions will be peer reviewed by conference committees and accepted papers of ICOCE 2025 will be published as international conference proceedings in Springer book series: Lecture Notes in Civil Engineering, which will be submittted to EI Compendex , Scopus, Inspec, SCImago, ZbMATH etc for indexing. Authors are encouraged to submit your extended papers with at least 35% new content to International Journal of Structural and Civil Engineering Research , which will be sent to be reviewed by the IJSCER editorial board, and accepted papers will be published in IJCSCER and indexed by Google Scholar, ProQuest, etc.
